fulltext:
RESUME 
NGUYEN THI THANH TAM 
PERSONAL SUMMARY 
✓ More than 10 years’ experience in Quality Control. 
✓ Experience in Business Analyst skills. 
✓ Competent in Web testing, Application testing, Mobile testing. 
✓ Strong experience in software development and testing process. 
✓ Experience with agile methodologies. 
✓ Experience in designing test case, functional test, integration test and system test.  
✓ Solid experience in estimating test time of new functions, planning test schedule, 
communicating directly with clients. 
✓ Experience with MS SQL Server, Postman. 
✓ Proficient in using tools to support BA task including: Wireframe and Chart tools (Balsamiq 
Mockup 3, Draw.io, Microsoft Visio). 
✓ Familiar with Operating Systems: Windows XP, Windows 2003 Server, Windows Vista, Windows 
7,Linux, Windows 8, Macintosh, Android, iOS, and Windows phone. 
✓ Good knowledge in Issue-tracking systems: Bugzilla, Jira, Team Foundation Server. 
✓ Seasoned knowledge and practical experience in writing specification. 
✓ Quick-learning, team-playing, hardworking, motivated, and highly organized individual. 
✓ Strong English communication skills and reading technical document.  
✓ Good team-spirit. 
KEY COMPETENCIES AND SKILLS 
STRONG TECHNICAL EXPERTISE 
✓ Strong technical background with more than 10 years’ experience in the IT industry. 
✓ Solid knowledge and experience in software development and product verification. 
✓ Involved working with client to elicit requirement by questionnaire, email. Specify use case 
diagram, flow chart, create user stories for BA task. 
✓ Involved working closely with engineers, technician, managers and professional staff in a variety 
of projects across commercial and industrial environment. 
MANAGEMENT SKILLS 
✓ Seasoned act as leading position to manage teams of QC in a variety of projects. 
✓ Worked with clients, Product Owner, Project Manager to analyze requirements and took 
responsibility for the product quality. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Jan. 2019 -  Present 
Business Analyst 
Project Name: Site Manager – JP Morgan 
• 
Project description: 
✓ The purpose of project to build an in-house platform that allows them to publish and 
maintain multiple client to client’s member concierge and self-service booking needs with fast 
turnaround time and short time to market for clients. 
✓ The system provides many features like ability to customize the layout, design of websites, 
ability to create and configure website for client and manage it pages using available themes, 
templates and modules, set a website to published/live. Support multi languages, reports, 
logs and tiers. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Elicit requirement from Product Owner. 
✓ Create diagram/ flow chart and validate with client to get approval, suggestion for 
requirement. 
✓ Create user stories, do data mapping from the UI mockup and query data from API. 
✓ Work with team to transfer requirement, support to clarify unclear issues. 
✓ Validate the build before sending to customer. 
• 
Technologies: 
✓ Java, JavaScript, C#. 
✓ DB: MS SQL. 
✓ API: Java. 
✓ OS Platform: Web, iOS & Android. 
✓ Tools & Utilities: Visual Studio, Postman, Balsamiq Mockup 3, Jira. 
Jun. 2017 -  Dec.2018 
BA, Senior QC  
Project Name: Nanshan Website 
• 
Project description: 
✓ A website for admin to manage booking the airport service. 
✓ A website for user to book airport services such as: Limo transfer, expedited immigration. And 
users can manage their profile and bookings. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Elicit requirement from Product Owner. 
✓ Create Work breakdown structure to estimate for new enhancements and decompose 
requirement details. 
✓ Develop and manage manual test cases. 
✓ Work with team to transfer requirement, support to clarify unclear issues 
✓ Assign task for QC’s team and send the test report. 
✓ Communicate directly with the client for any issues on staging, Production. 
• 
Technologies: 
✓ Java, JavaScript, C#. 
✓ DB: MS SQL. 
✓ API: Java. 
✓ OS Platform: Web, iOS & Android. 
✓ Tools & Utilities: Visual Studio, Postman, Balsamiq Mockup 3, Jira. 
Project Name: HSBC Bank Concierge Website 
• 
Project description: 
✓ This is a website using Sitecore CMS as a main platform. It provides the airport services for 
clients of HSBC bank to book airport services such as: Limo transfer, expedited immigration. And 
users can manage their profile and bookings. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Develop and manage manual test cases. 
✓ Attend meetings with developers and managers on risk assessment of the product. 
✓ Assign task for QC’s team and send the test report. 
✓ Revise current test cases to reflect changes made to the Test Plan documentation for new 
functionality and performance issues. 
✓ Communicate directly with the client for any issues on staging, Production. 
• 
Technologies: 
✓ Java, JavaScript, C#. 
✓ DB: MS SQL. 
✓ API: Java. 
✓ OS Platform: Web, iOS & Android. 
✓ Tools & Utilities: Visual Studio, Postman, Jira. 
May. 2011 -  May. 2017 
QC ENGINEER 
Project Name: Customer Center 
• 
Project description: 
✓ The website provides endpoint security and data risk management solutions for thousands of 
customers around the globe. By providing with a persistent connection to all of their devices, 
they can secure endpoints, assess risk, and respond appropriately to security incidents.. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Create test plan document. 
✓ Develop and manage manual test cases. 
✓ Create and verify work ticket. 
✓ Execute test cases, do regression test, smoke test for each release. 
• 
Technologies: 
✓ SQL DB 
✓ OS Platform: Web, iOS & Android. 
✓ Tools & Utilities: Visual Studio, Jira, Test Rail. 
Project Name: Lojack for Laptop 
• 
Project description: 
✓ LoJack is the leader in data protection and theft recovery, with the only security solution that 
both locates your missing device and gets it back to you. Already embedded in your device’s 
firmware, once activated, the patented Persistence technology can survive a factory reset or 
hard wipe, allowing the industry’s only Investigations and Recovery Team to locate and retrieve 
your stolen laptop, smartphone or tablet. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Create test plan document. 
✓ Develop and manage manual test cases. 
✓ Create and verify work ticket. 
✓ Execute test cases, do regression test, smoke test for each release. 
• 
Technologies: 
✓ SQL DB. 
✓ OS Platform: Web, iOS & Android. 
✓ Tools & Utilities: Java, Javascript, Visual Studio, Jira, Test Rail. 
Oct. 2008 – Apr. 2011 
QC ENGINEER 
Project Name: PM3 E-library System 
• 
Project description: 
✓ This is a system to manage document of PM3 company. It makes user easy to find, registry to 
borrow all document related to PM3. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Create test plan, prepare test environment. 
✓ Developed and managed manual test cases. 
✓ Write problem reports and text execution records. 
• 
Technologies: 
✓ .NET (C#), MS SQL 2008, MS Visual Source Safe. 
✓ OS: Windows XP Professional 64 bits, Windows 7, Windows 8, Mac. 
Project Name: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) 
Project description: 
✓ Building a local system to manage about Customer Relationship. CRM systems are designed to 
compile information on customers across different channels -- or points of contact between the 
customer and the company -- which could include the company’s website, telephone, live chat, 
direct mail, marketing materials and social media. 
Responsibilities: 
✓ Create test plan, prepare test environment. 
✓ Developed and managed manual test cases. 
✓ Execute smoke test, sanity test, tracking bugs to ensure quality of CRM system which is the 
application to manage customer relationship including module : Sale Force, Marketing, Admin, 
Report. 
✓ Write problem reports and text execution records. 
Technologies: 
✓ .NET (C#), MS SQL 2008, MS Visual Source Safe. 
✓ OS: Window, Mac. 
• 
• 
• 
CERTIFICATES & QUALIFICATIONS 
2006 
 Information Technology 
 The Human Tranning Job School 
2009 
Software Quality Control 
TMA Tranning Center 
2010 
Software testing for tester 
FMIT, HCMC, Vietnam 
Project Management 
PMC, HCMC, Vietnam 
Software Process (CMMi) 
SaigonCTT 
2012 
Bachelor- English Language Teacher Education 
VNU University of Languages and International Studies  
ISTQB – ISEB Certified Tester Foundation Level 
WORK HISTORY 
2008 – 2011: Test Engineer at TINHVAN GROUP  
2011 – Now: Senior Test Engineer at Sunrise Software Solutions Corporation (S3) 
CONTACT ME 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Phone number: 0903098821  
Email: tam.applause@gmail.com
